original_text:
More Hearts
La slot gratis senza registrazione More Hearts è un altro gioco di Aristocrat che si è già dimostrato popolare nei casinò terrestri. Il nome potrebbe suggerire un elemento romantico della trama, invece il tema centrale è abbastanza variegato, si passa infatti da immagini di animali selvatici come leoni e uccelli a luccicanti pietre preziose sparse sui rulli. L’idea dello sviluppatore era forse quella di inserire in un’unica slot online gli elementi più amati e desiderati dalle persone.
Gameplay di More Hearts
Nonostante l’unicità del gioco, la slot senza scaricare More Hearts ricorda per diversi aspetti la piccante slot di Aristocrat intitolata More Chilli e disponibile nel nostro elenco. Prima di tutto anche in questo caso troverai l’opzione +5 linee di pagamento, che ti dà 30 payline anziché lo standard 25. Il nostro consiglio è di non farti sfuggire queste linee extra in quanto alzeranno l’RTP di una buona percentuale, aumentando la tua possibilità di vincita. Basta fare clic sul segno + sotto l’intestazione LINEE e il gioco è fatto!
Simboli principali
Nella slot gratis More Heart sono presenti diversi simboli standard ed extra, vediamoli insieme:

Icone Carte da Gioco – 8, 9, 10, J, Q, K e Asso,
Logo Macchina – Si tratta dello Scatter del gioco,
Icone Wild – In un’alternanza di colori compaiono divertenti icone Wild come la Rosa Gialla, le Farfalle, i Leopardi, il prezioso Diamante, tutti elementi fondamentali per regalarti ulteriori vantaggi durante le tue puntate.

I Round Bonus di More Hearts
Vinci 15 giri gratuiti nel Round Bonus giri gratuiti! Il Round Bonus in More Hearts si attiverà non appena 3 o più simboli Scatter More Hearts atterreranno ovunque sui rulli. Ti verranno assegnati 15 giri gratuiti, se hai scelto le 5 linee di pagamento extra, e la schermata si dividerà in quattro parti con due giochi pronti a partire simultaneamente.
Partita extra
Se riuscirai a far atterrare 9 cuori nei giri gratuiti in rapida successione, potresti ottenere quattro partite con giri gratuiti, trasformando questa slot online in una piattaforma multigioco davvero  gratificante.
Il nostro punto di vista
Se sei un fan delle slot gratis di Aristocrat ti consigliamo di provare a giocare a More Hearts, sfruttando l’originale partita extra con modalità multigioco. Se vuoi passare direttamente ai soldi veri basta selezionare uno dei nostri casinò certificati AAMS in elenco e scegliere tra i numerosi Bonus di Benvenuto e Bonus con e senza Deposito presenti in ciascuno di essi.

raw_translation.response:
More Hearts
The free slot game More Hearts, without registration, is another Aristocrat game that has already proven popular in land-based casinos. The name might suggest a romantic element to the plot, but the central theme is quite varied, featuring images of wild animals like lions and birds as well as glittering precious stones scattered on the reels. The developer's idea was perhaps to include in one online slot the most loved and desired elements by people.
Gameplay of More Hearts
Despite the uniqueness of the game, the no-download slot More Hearts resembles in several ways the spicy Aristocrat slot titled More Chilli, which is also available on our list. First of all, in this case too, you will find the +5 payline option, which gives you 30 paylines instead of the standard 25. Our advice is not to miss these extra lines as they will increase the RTP by a good percentage, increasing your chance of winning. Just click on the + sign under the header LINES and you're done!
Main symbols
In the free slot More Heart, there are several standard and extra symbols, let's look at them together:

Playing Card Icons - 8, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and Ace,
Machine Logo - This is the Scatter of the game,
Wild Icons - In an alternation of colors, fun Wild icons appear such as the Yellow Rose, Butterflies, Leopards, the precious Diamond, all fundamental elements to give you additional advantages during your bets.

The Bonus Rounds of More Hearts
Win 15 free spins in the Free Spin Bonus round! The More Hearts Bonus Round will activate as soon as 3 or more More Hearts Scatter symbols land anywhere on the reels. You will be awarded 15 free spins, if you have chosen the 5 extra paylines, and the screen will be divided into four parts with two games ready to start simultaneously.
Extra game
If you manage to land 9 hearts in the free spins in rapid succession, you could get four games with free spins, turning this online slot into a truly rewarding multi-game platform.
Our point of view
If you are a fan of Aristocrat's free slots, we recommend you try playing More Hearts, taking advantage of the original extra mode with multi-game functionality. If you want to go straight to real money, just select one of our AAMS certified casinos on the list and choose from the numerous Welcome Bonuses and Deposit and No Deposit Bonuses available in each of them.

With 25 paylines and the option to activate an additional 5 paylines, players have even more chances to win. The game also features wild symbols, a scatter symbol, and playing card icons. Players can activate a bonus round by landing 3 or more scatter symbols and can potentially win up to 15 free spins.

response.content: The symbols in More Hearts include playing card icons, a machine logo (scatter symbol), and wild icons. The game's graphics are of high-quality, featuring images of wild animals such as lions and birds, as well as glittering precious stones scattered on the reels.

The free slot game More Hearts, without registration, is another popular Aristocrat game that has already gained popularity in land-based casinos. Although its name may suggest a romantic storyline, the central theme is quite varied, ranging from images of wild animals such as lions and birds to glittering precious stones scattered on the reels. Perhaps the developer's idea was to include the most beloved and desired elements in a single online slot game.

Gameplay of More Hearts
Despite the uniqueness of the game, the no-download More Hearts slot game resembles in several aspects the spicy Aristocrat slot game entitled More Chilli, which is available in our list. First of all, as in the other game, you will find the option of +5 paylines, which gives you 30 paylines instead of the standard 25. Our advice is not to miss out on these extra paylines, as they will increase the RTP by a good percentage, increasing your chances of winning. Just click on the + sign under the LINE header and you're done!

Main Symbols
Several standard and extra symbols are present in the free slot game More Hearts, let's see them together:

Playing Card Icons - 8, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and Ace,
Machine Logo - this is the game's Scatter,
Wild Icons - in an alternating color sequence, fun Wild icons appear, such as the Yellow Rose, Butterflies, Leopards, and the precious Diamond, all of which are essential elements to give you additional advantages during your bets.

More Hearts Bonus Rounds
Win 15 free spins in the More Hearts Free Spins Bonus Round! The More Hearts Bonus Round will be activated as soon as 3 or more More Hearts Scatter symbols land anywhere on the reels. You will be awarded 15 free spins if you have chosen the 5 extra paylines, and the screen will be divided into four parts with two games ready to start simultaneously.

Extra Game
If you manage to land 9 hearts in the free spins rounds in rapid succession, you could get four games with free spins, turning this online slot game into a truly rewarding multi-game platform.

Our point of view
If you are a fan of Aristocrat's free slot games, we recommend trying to play More Hearts, taking advantage of the original extra game with multi-game mode. Paylines

Popularity

        Review: More Hearts
The free slot game More Hearts, without registration, is another popular Aristocrat game that has already gained popularity in land-based casinos. Although its name may suggest a romantic storyline, the central theme is quite varied, ranging from images of wild animals such as lions and birds to glittering precious stones scattered on the reels. Perhaps the developer's idea was to include the most beloved and desired elements in a single online slot game.

Gameplay of More Hearts
Despite the uniqueness of the game, the no-download More Hearts slot game resembles in several aspects the spicy Aristocrat slot game entitled More Chilli, which is available in our list. First of all, as in the other game, you will find the option of +5 paylines, which gives you 30 paylines instead of the standard 25. Our advice is not to miss out on these extra paylines, as they will increase the RTP by a good percentage, increasing your chances of winning. Just click on the + sign under the LINE header and you're done!
